description:
Zeblaze Ares 3 Plus

Zeblaze Ares 3 Plus is a budget smartwatch that comes with a rugged design and IP68 rating. It has a 1.43-inch circular AMOLED screen with 466 x 466 resolution, 1,000 nits brightness, and AOD support. It does all the health and fitness tracking as well as the regular watch features. It is equipped with Bluetooth v5.2 for wireless connectivity and to allow for calling and voice assistant features. It packs a 280 mAh battery that can last up to 18 days on typical usage and takes 90 minutes to recharge.
features: Sleek and Durable: The Ares 3 Plus is designed to withstand the rigors of an active lifestyle while maintaining a sophisticated appearance.
Large, Vibrant Display: The 1.43-inch HD AMOLED display offers excellent visibility and color accuracy.
Protective Features: The tempered glass screen with an anti-fingerprint coating ensures durability and easy maintenance.
Comprehensive Health Monitoring: Track blood oxygen saturation, heart rate (including abnormal heart rate warnings), stress levels, and sleep quality.
Menstrual Cycle Tracking: The watch provides features specifically designed for women, including menstrual cycle tracking.
Versatile Sports Modes: With over 100 sports modes, the Ares 3 Plus can track a wide range of activities, from running and cycling to yoga and strength training.
Hands-Free Communication: Make and receive calls directly from your watch using Bluetooth connectivity.
Offline Voice Assistant: Enjoy the convenience of a built-in voice assistant, even without an internet connection.
Smart Notifications: Receive notifications for SMS, calls, and apps directly on your wrist.
Music Control: Control your phone’s music playback and camera using the watch.
Lifestyle Features: Set alarms, stopwatches, and reminders, and access weather forecasts.
Long-Lasting Battery: The 280mAh battery provides up to 14 days of typical usage and 30 days in battery saver mode.
Wide Compatibility: Compatible with Android 5.0 and above, as well as iOS 10.0 and above devices.

specs.value: Rugged design with circular dial, IP68 rated
Zinc Bezels, Stainless steel buttons, Fluoroelastomer strap
280 mAh, up to 7 days on heavy usage, up to 18 days on typical usage
90 minutes, via Magnetic charging cable in the box

title: Zeblaze Ares 3 Plus Smartwatch

description:
Xiaomi Redmi Watch 3 Active Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch

The Redmi Watch 3 Active comes with an ultra-large 1.83" LCD display. It has a classic rectangle-shaped case with a metallic finish that adds a touch of elegance, and the colourful straps offer easy matching. The watch supports Bluetooth phone calls, making it convenient to answer calls on the go. With 100+ fitness modes and 5 ATM water resistance, it is suitable for various sports activities. The watch also includes features like blood oxygen saturation detection, all-day heart rate monitoring, scientific sleep monitoring, and magnetic charging, providing up to 12 days of battery life.

Ultra Large 1.83" LCD Display

Experience a clear and vibrant visual experience with the ultra-large 1.83" display of the Redmi Watch 3 Active. The rich colors and clear display make it easy to view notifications and workout data at a glance. The 2.5D curved high-strength glass adds elegance and durability to the watch. You can easily express your style with more than 200 watch faces to choose from.

Stylish Rectangle Watch

The Redmi Watch 3 Active features a stylish rectangle-shaped case with a metallic finish middle frame. The NCVM-processed body adds an exquisite touch to its appearance. With a dual-color body and colorful straps, you can easily match your watch to your style.

Bluetooth Voice Calls

The Xiaomi Redmi Watch 3 Active Smart Watch provides seamless connectivity and easy phone call handling. With its Bluetooth connectivity feature, you can stay connected at all times and easily answer calls by tapping on your watch. Whether you're at work or working out, enjoy the convenience of hands-free communication and a more stylish way to handle phone calls.

100+ Fitness Modes

Xiaomi Redmi Watch 3 Active has over 100 sport modes, including 10 professional sports modes, to take your fitness journey to the next level. Built-in sensors and professional sports algorithms monitor and analyze your body during various activities, providing detailed insights and tracking your efforts.

5 ATM Water Resistance

The Redmi Watch 3 Active offers a remarkable 5 ATM water resistance rating, ensuring it can withstand splashes and even participate in shallow water activities. With this level of water resistance, you can wear it confidently throughout your daily adventures without worrying about potential damage.

Health Monitoring Features

The Redmi Watch 3 Active offers comprehensive health monitoring features, including blood oxygen saturation detection and all-day heart rate monitoring. Stay informed about your physical condition and receive alerts for low blood oxygen levels or high heart rates.

Comprehensive Health Monitoring

Master your sleep patterns and optimize your sleep quality with the scientific sleep monitoring feature of Xiaomi Redmi Watch 3 Active. The watch continuously monitors your blood oxygen and heart rate during different sleep stages, providing you with valuable insights and suggestions for improving your sleep.

Magnetic Charging and Long Battery Life

The Redmi Watch 3 Active offers an impressive battery life of up to 12 days, thanks to its low power consumption hardware and software. Enjoy hassle-free charging with the magnetic charging feature. Stay powered up without worrying about running out of battery.

description:
FONENG BL152 ANC + ENC True Wireless Earbuds

The FONENG BL152 ANC + ENC True Wireless Earbuds provide a full audio experience designed for modern consumers that value quality and simplicity. These BL152 earbuds, powered by the sophisticated Plan JL7006F8 chipset, use Bluetooth version 5.3 to provide a solid and efficient connection, decreasing latency and keeping your audio sharp and synced. These earbuds support various audio protocols, including HFP, HSP, A2DP, AVRCP, SPP, PBAP, and TWS+, allowing them to offer high-fidelity sound across a wide range of devices and apps. The FONENG BL152 earbuds are designed for freedom, with a Bluetooth range of up to 10 meters, allowing you to walk about without losing connection. The Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) and Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) technologies work together to eliminate undesirable background noise, whether you're in a noisy area or just want to listen to music without interruption. Each earbud has a battery life of up to 5 hours and can play music continuously, making them great for everyday commuting, exercises, or long talks. When not in use, the BL152 earbuds may be kept in the tiny battery box, which protects them while also increasing their standby duration to 12 hours. The battery box has a 3.7V/250mAh capacity and charges via a contemporary Type-C connection, requiring only one hour to completely recharge. The earbuds contain a battery capacity of 3.7V/35mAh, guaranteeing that they are ready for use when you need them. The FONENG BL152 earbuds offer more than simply performance; they're also developed with user ease in mind. The rapid charging capability, paired with their lightweight design and snug fit, make them an ideal choice for anybody searching for genuine wireless earbuds that excel at both function and form. Whether you're streaming music, taking calls, or simply relaxing with ANC, the FONENG BL152 delivers a high-quality listening experience.

Bluetooth 5.3 Stable technology
45-degree Obique in-ear design

description:
Description

Haylou X1 2023 True Wireless Earbuds

The Haylou X1 2023 True Wireless Earbuds offer a unique and stylish audio experience. With its 12mm dynamic driver, the sound is tailored to your preferences, delivering immersive audio quality. The earbuds feature ENC technology for clear calls, ensuring crystal-clear communication. With a 24-hour battery life, you can enjoy your music all day long. The half in-ear design provides a comfortable fit, while the IPX4 waterproof rating offers protection against water splashes. The metallic case adds a touch of elegance and durability. With Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity and app control, you have seamless wireless freedom and enhanced control over your audio experience.

Aluminum Alloy Case

The Haylou X1 2023 features an elegant and stylish aluminum alloy charging case with a streamlined design. Its matte finish process reduces fingerprints and scratches, maintaining a clean and polished appearance. The charging indicator, located at the Type-C position, is exquisitely designed and eye-catching.

12mm Dynamic Driver

The Haylou X1 2023 features a 12mm large dynamic driver, delivering an open sound stage and powerful audio. With a titanium-plated diaphragm, it offers high sensitivity and balanced lows, mids, and highs. The inclusion of an HD audio codec ensures rich sound details and smooth performance for an immersive listening experience.

Half In-Ear Design

The Haylou X1 2023 offers an ergonomic and comfortable wearing experience with its half-in-ear design and 60° in-ear angle, ensuring a close and secure fit that conforms to the contours of your ear.

Ultra-Low Latency

Haylou X1 2023 provides a smooth gaming experience with its low-latency algorithm, delivering clear and synchronized audio for immersive gameplay, ensuring that you can hear footsteps, gunshots, and special effects with precision.

ENC for Clear Calls

The Haylou X1 2023 features a highly sensitive microphone and advanced ENC algorithm that effectively reduces background noise during calls, ensuring clear and uninterrupted communication by minimizing disturbances such as street noise.

IPX4 Waterproof

The Haylou X1 2023 earbuds are rated IPX4 waterproof, making them resistant to sweat and light rain, allowing you to enjoy music in various conditions. While they provide protection against splashes, they should not be worn during heavy rain or showers.

Sensitive Touch Control

The Haylou X1 2023 earbuds offer convenient high-precision smart touch controls for easy usage. You can switch between music and calls without needing to access your phone. During music playback, a double-click on either earbud allows you to play or pause, while a triple-click on the left or right earbud lets you skip tracks backward or forward. Holding down the left or right earbud activates gaming mode. For incoming calls, a double-click on either earbud answers or hangs up the call, and a triple-click on either earbud rejects the call.
features: Model: Haylou X1 2023
12mm Dynamic Driver
ENC for clear calls
Half in-ear design
IPX4 waterproof

description: The Awei P52K is a powerful 10000mAh power bank that combines wireless and fast charging capabilities to keep your devices energized effortlessly. With its 22.5W fast charging via USB-A and 20W via USB-C, it ensures rapid power delivery, reducing downtime. features: 22.5W High-Speed Charge: The Awei P52K 10000mAh Power Bank supports multiple fast charging protocols. The Type-C output port supports up to 22.5W fast charging. The power conversion efficiency is as high as 65% which can charge the mobile phone 2 to 3 times.

10000mAh Large Capacity: The power bank is equipped with a massive 10,000mAh battery capacity. It offers multiple-time full charges for most smartphones. This means you can stay connected, browse the web, or stream your favorite content without worrying about running out of power.

Magnetic Wireless Charging: The Awei P52K Power Bank boasts integrated wireless charging capabilities, allowing you to simply place your Qi-enabled smartphone on the power bank’s surface for effortless charging. Furthermore, it supports various wireless charging protocols, including 5W, 7.5W, 10W, and even 15W for compatible devices, ensuring fast and efficient wireless power transfer.

Wired Fast Charging: The Awei P52K isn’t just limited to wireless charging. It also features two USB ports and a Type-C port, providing a total of three wired charging options. In addition, it supports various fast-charging protocols for both input and output, ensuring speedy charging times for all your devices, regardless of whether they support wireless charging.

Type-C & Lighting iP Dual Input: The Awei power bank comes with three ports. One USB-A, one Type-C, and one lightning port are available in this power bank. Both Type-C and lightning ports support power input.
Digital Power Display: Awei P52K Powerbank has a digital power display that shows the battery level.

Over Charge and Over Output Protection: The polymer high-density battery core, efficient and intelligent output stable voltage and current, and multiple safety protection to actively filter out dangers. Multiple safety protection of the power bank helps your devices not get overcharged. Also, the power bank itself has overcharge protection.
Output Over Voltage Protection: With the Awei P52K 22.5K 10000mAh Magnetic Wireless Power Bank, your phone is safe and secure for charging. Because the power bank comes with over-voltage protection.

Aviation Flight Standards Power Bank: It Complies with the international UN38.3 air transports standard and allows for worry-free boarding. It can be boarded by plane/high-speed rail/subway without any problem.

A superior audio experience combined with ease and versatility can be had with the OnePlus Buds 3 ANC True Wireless Earbuds, which have a minimal audio latency of 94ms and unique features like OnePlus Audio ID 2.0.

description: The Oraimo OHP-610 BoomPop 2 is a wireless Bluetooth headphone designed for music enthusiasts seeking flexibility and extended battery life. It features Bluetooth version 5.3, ensuring a stable and efficient connection. The headphone boasts an impressive 60-hour playtime, allowing for prolonged use without frequent recharging. Fast charging capabilities further enhance its convenience. The BoomPop 2 delivers booming bass, providing an immersive audio experience. Its colorful design adds a vibrant touch, appealing to users who value both functionality and style.
features: The Oraimo OHP-610 BoomPop 2 Wireless Headset is a powerhouse of sound and convenience. Designed to meet the demands of music enthusiasts and gamers alike, this headset promises an unparalleled audio experience. Let’s dive into its exceptional features.

At the heart of the BoomPop 2 are advanced 40mm drivers and the exclusive HavyBass™ technology. These elements come together to deliver rich, dynamic bass that engulfs you in waves of sound. Whether you’re listening to music or immersing yourself in a gaming world, the powerful deep bass ensures a remarkable audio journey.

Battery life is often a concern with wireless headphones, but the BoomPop 2 addresses this worry head-on. With a 500mAh battery, you can enjoy up to an astonishing 60 hours of music playback. Even a short 15-minute charge provides a solid 10 hours of playtime, thanks to AniFast™ technology. This keeps the tunes flowing throughout your day without interruptions.

For those who like to multitask, the dual-device connection feature is a game-changer. The BoomPop 2 can connect to two devices simultaneously. This means you can switch between gaming on your tablet and taking calls on your phone seamlessly. No more missed calls or interruptions.

Comfort is also a priority. The headset boasts a soft headband and artificial PU earpads that ensure an exceptional and long-lasting fit. Furthermore, it’s lightweight and foldable, making it effortlessly portable in your bag or pocket.

Gamers will appreciate the low-latency Game Mode, which syncs audio and video perfectly, creating an authentic gaming experience. Activate this mode through the Oraimo Sound App, a handy tool for customizing your audio preferences.

description: The Hoco HB45 Spirit 2-in-1 USB & Type-C 3.0 Card Reader is a precisely developed gadget that connects a variety of digital devices to memory cards. With a dual interface that includes both USB-A and Type-C ports, this card reader offers unrivaled versatility, assuring compatibility with a wide range of devices, including current smartphones and tablets, laptops, cameras, and dashboard cameras. Whether you're on the road or at your desk, the Hoco HB45 makes it easier to view and share data. One of the Hoco HB45's notable characteristics is its ability to read and write SD and TF cards at the same time. This dual-slot feature not only increases efficiency, but also enables for rapid backups and transfers between various memory. The gadget can handle high-capacity memory cards of up to 2TB, making it ideal for professionals and hobbyists that work with big amounts of data, such as photographers, filmmakers, and tech-savvy consumers. The Hoco HB45 delivers exceptional performance. The card reader has two transmission speeds, depending on the connection type. When connected via USB 3.0, the speed jumps substantially to 5Gbps, allowing for the speedy transmission of huge data, such as 4K films or high-resolution photos, in only seconds. The Hoco HB45 is built with durability in mind, using high-quality ABS material to resist the rigors of everyday usage while being lightweight and portable. The gadget runs efficiently at a working voltage of 5V and a current of 100mA, making it energy-efficient and simple to power from any compatible device without depleting battery life. The Hoco HB45 is more than just a card reader; it's a full-featured data management tool that adapts to your needs, whether you're moving files between your camera and smartphone or accessing data from many devices. Its small size makes it easy to transport in your purse or pocket, guaranteeing that you always have access to your data, no matter where you are.

description:
XIAOMI Redmi Buds 4 Active True Wireless Earbuds

The XIAOMI Redmi Buds 4 Active True Wireless Earbuds are equipped with advanced Bluetooth 5.3 for a stable connection. They feature a 12mm dynamic driver that delivers powerful bass and enhanced acoustics. The earbuds have noise cancellation for clear calls. The earbuds support low-latency mode for a smooth gaming experience and offer convenient touch control operations. They are compatible with Google Fast Pair for quick connection to Android devices. The earbuds are water-resistant with an IPX4 rating.

12mm Dynamic Driver

The XIAOMI Redmi Buds 4 Active is equipped with a 12mm dynamic driver and delivers powerful bass and heightened acoustics. Expertly tuned by the Xiaomi Acoustic Lab, these earbuds provide a pleasing listening experience for users worldwide, immersing you in the richness of your favorite music.

Noise Cancellation for Calls

The Redmi Buds 4 Active features a high-sensitivity microphone that effectively mitigates ambient noise, ensuring optimal clarity of speech. Whether you're in a busy environment or on the move, these earbuds enable clear communication.

28-hour Ultra Long Battery Life

XIAOMI Redmi Buds 4 Active offers an impressive battery life, providing up to 5 hours of continuous listening on a single charge. With the portable charging case, you can extend the usage to an impressive 28 hours, allowing you to enjoy great music day and night without worrying about recharging frequently.

Fast Charging Support

Redmi Buds 4 Active allows you to quickly charge them for just 10 minutes and enjoy up to 110 minutes of music playback. This feature ensures you can take short breaks and get right back into your music journey without any significant interruptions.

Smooth Gaming Experience with Low-Latency Mode

Bluetooth 5.3 technology of the Redmi Buds 4 Active enables low-latency mode for a smooth gaming experience with exceptional precision. With reduced lag, you can enjoy immersive gaming sessions and stay in control with accurate and timely responses.

Convenient Touch Control

Controlling your earbuds is made easy with touch control operations. With light touches, you can effortlessly switch between different modes, skip to the next track, play/pause music, answer or reject calls, and more. The Redmi Buds 4 Active give you complete control from anywhere.

Google Fast Pair

The Redmi Buds 4 Active support Google Fast Pair by simply opening the cover, allowing for simple Bluetooth pairing with your Android devices. With a single tap, you can connect and even locate your misplaced earbuds.

IPX4 water-resistance

The Redmi Buds 4 Active feature an IPX4 water-resistant design that has passed rigorous testing. Whether you're outdoors or hitting the gym, these earbuds can handle your active lifestyle, providing reliable performance even in the face of sweat or light rain.

This increased coverage ensures a reliable and high-speed internet connection for various devices, including laptops, tablets, smartphones, game consoles, and smart TVs. description:
Xiaomi TV Box S (2nd Gen) Android TV Box

Xiaomi TV Box S (2nd Gen) is an Android TV Box that brings a world of entertainment and connectivity to your living room. With a sleek design, powerful hardware, and a host of features, it's a perfect addition to any modern home entertainment setup. One of the standout features of this Android TV Box is its support for 4K resolution at 60FPS, ensuring that you get crystal-clear, lifelike visuals. Whether you're streaming your favorite movies and TV shows, or playing video games, the Xiaomi TV Box S delivers a stunning and immersive viewing experience. It doesn't stop at just 4K; it also supports a range of audio technologies, including Dolby Audio and DTS-HD, ensuring that your audio quality matches the exceptional video quality. The device is compact, with dimensions of 95.25mm x 95.25mm and a thickness of 16.7mm, making it easy to place discreetly in your entertainment center. It's lightweight at just 142g, which makes it easy to move around or even take with you when you travel. The sleek black color of the box adds a touch of sophistication to your entertainment setup. In terms of connectivity, the Xiaomi TV Box S offers both Wi-Fi and Bluetooth options. It supports dual-band Wi-Fi, operating at both 2.4GHz and 5GHz, ensuring a stable and fast internet connection. With Bluetooth 5.2, you can easily connect wireless peripherals such as headphones, game controllers, or keyboards. When it comes to ports and interfaces, the Xiaomi TV Box S doesn't disappoint. It features an HDMI 2.1 port, which is ideal for connecting to modern 4K and 8K TVs, ensuring high-quality video transmission. Additionally, there is a USB 2.0 port for connecting external storage devices, game controllers, or other accessories. description:
Xiaomi A22i 21.45 Inch 75Hz FHD Monitor

HP E24q G5 is a 23.8-inch monitor designed for users who need a high-quality display for both work and entertainment. With a display size of 21.45 inches, this monitor offers a resolution of Full HD (1920 x 1080), ensuring clear and sharp visuals. The monitor's aspect ratio of 16:9 provides a widescreen viewing experience, making it ideal for watching videos, browsing, or multitasking. One of the key features of the HP E24q G5 is its IPS panel, which delivers vibrant colors and wide viewing angles. With a brightness level of 250 nits, the screen is bright enough for most indoor environments. The monitor also boasts a contrast ratio of 3000:1, which helps to produce deep blacks and vivid colors. It supports a refresh rate of 75 Hz, providing smoother motion for everyday tasks and casual gaming. Additionally, the monitor supports up to 16.7 million colors and covers 72% of the NTSC color gamut, ensuring accurate color reproduction. The monitor has a flat design, making it a good fit for a variety of setups. It does not come with built-in speakers, which might be a consideration for users who require audio output. In terms of connectivity, the HP E24q G5 is equipped with both VGA and HDMI ports, allowing it to connect to a wide range of devices, from older PCs to modern laptops and gaming consoles. The monitor is physically compact, with dimensions of 493 mm in length, 165 mm in width, and 376 mm in height, and it weighs just 2.2 kg, making it relatively easy to move or adjust. In terms of power consumption, the HP E24q G5 is energy-efficient, with a maximum power consumption of 24W. It operates on a voltage of 12V⎓2.0A, making it suitable for use in a variety of regions. Overall, this monitor offers a good balance of features, making it a versatile choice for both home and office use.

The smartwatch is 5ATM water-resistant, which makes it ideal for a variety of water activities.

Stunning Display and Design

The Xiaomi Watch 2 has a vibrant 1.43-inch AMOLED display with a resolution of 466x466 pixels. It has 326 ppi, which helps to get very good clarity and color depth. With brightness levels of up to 600 nits, you'll have excellent visibility even in direct sunlight on Xiaomi Watch 2. The watch measures 47.5mm by 45.9mm, with a slim 11.8mm (excluding the heart rate sensor). The smart watch weighs just 36.8 grams without the strap, making it lightweight and comfortable to wear all day.

Powerful Performance

The Xiaomi Watch 2 is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon W5+ Gen 1 Platform. It is built using a 4nm manufacturing process. This powerful processor ensures smooth performance and optimal battery life. With 2GB of RAM and 32GB of storage, you have plenty of room for apps, music, and more.

Seamless Connectivity

The Xiaomi Watch 2 offers dual-band Wi-Fi (2.4GHz/5GHz) and Bluetooth® 5.2 connectivity. You can enjoy a smooth and reliable connection while streaming music, receiving notifications, or making Bluetooth calls. The smartwatch is compatible with smartphones running Android 8.0 and above, excluding the Android

Fitness and Health Tracking

The Xiaomi Watch 2 has comprehensive health tracking features can help you achieve your fitness goals. The Smart Watch features an optical heart rate sensor, accelerometer, gyroscope, ambient light sensor, electronic compass, and barometer. These sensors work together to accurately track your activities, heart rate, and environmental conditions on this smart watch. The smartwatch is also 5ATM water-resistant, which makes it ideal for swimming and other aquatic activities. The Mi Fitness app (versions 3.26.0i and up) provides detailed insights and personalized recommendations to help you improve your workouts and health routines.

Advanced Navigation and Positioning

The advanced navigation capabilities of the Xiaomi Watch 2 ensure that you never lose your way. The smart watch supports dual-band GPS (L1+L5) and a variety of satellite systems, including Galileo, Glonass, Beidou, and QZSS. Enjoy accurate and reliable positioning while hiking, running, or exploring new cities.

description:
Xiaomi Mi XMC01 C300 360° 2K Smart Home Security WiFi Camera

The Xiaomi Mi C300 XMC01 is a next-generation IP security camera with super fine 2K color recording, super wide angle, smart persons tracking, and other features that will be a good investment for monitoring and safeguarding your house. The Xiaomi C300 smart camera has Ultra Clear HD technology with a resolution of up to 1296p (3 megapixels). The picture acquired by the camera is then clearly and cleanly recreated with exceptionally high detail. Also, the IP camera features a 6P lens with a high aperture of F1.4, allowing it to catch more light and more detailed photos even in low-light circumstances. The C300, for instance, is a camera that, because of its high-sensitivity sensor, can sustain color image display even in low-light circumstances. The AI technology included in the Xiaomi C300 interior camera assists the camera in properly detecting human figures, eliminating unwanted alarms generated by bugs or animals. The Xiaomi C300 also offers a 2-way conversation with a built-in microphone and speaker, allowing you to interact with your loved ones through the camera at any time and from any location. The Xiaomi C300 2K Wifi Camera also has a 2-axis tilting zoom motor with 360° horizontal and 108° vertical viewing angles. With such a wide field of view, a single camera may practically cover the whole area to be observed without the need for several cameras. The Xiaomi C300 XMC01 2K IP camera offers up to three storage methods: micro SD card, connected memory, and the cloud, allowing customers to easily back up their camera's picture and video data. H.265 video encoding technique saves 50% more storage space than H.264. Allows you to see every detail in high-quality films and photographs shot by the camera without having to worry about storage space or network bandwidth. The built-in Xiaomi security chip aids in the prevention of privacy leaks caused by video streaming and counterfeit devices. Only your authorized device may see the video encoded in the Mijia app; no other device or person can access the photographs or videos. The Xiaomi Mi XMC01 C300 WiFi Camera has no warranty.

description:
Original Samsung 25W PD Adapter USB-C (3 Pin)

The Samsung 25W PD Adapter USB-C (3 Pin) is a versatile and powerful charging solution designed to meet the demands of modern devices. This adapter offers Super Fast Charging capabilities with a maximum output of 25W, ensuring rapid power delivery to compatible devices. It supports Power Delivery (PD) 3.0 with Programmable Power Supply (PPS), also at a maximum of 25W, providing efficient and optimized charging for a wide range of devices. The adapter is designed to work with various input voltages ranging from 100 to 240 V, making it suitable for use in different countries.

When it comes to output specifications, this adapter offers flexibility to accommodate different charging needs. For normal charging, it provides a maximum output voltage of 5 V with a current of up to 3 A. In fast charging mode, it can deliver either 9 V through Power Delivery Output (PDO) or a variable voltage range of 3.3-5.9 V or 3.3-11.0 V through PPS. The corresponding maximum output currents for fast charging are 2.77 A for PDO at 9 V, and either 3.0 A (3.3-5.9 V range) or 2.25 A (3.3-11.0 V range) for PPS. Equipped with a USB Type-C port, this adapter ensures compatibility with the latest devices and charging standards. Its compact design and 3-pin plug configuration make it easy to use and carry, providing convenient access to power whenever needed.
features: Super Fast Charging max. 25W
PD 3.0 PPS max. 25W

description:
Kospet Tank M3 Rugged Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch

The Kospet Tank M3 Rugged Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch stands out as a tough and multifunctional wearable built to handle the demands of an active lifestyle. Its 1.96" AMOLED display, with a high resolution of 410*502, produces rich colors and fine details, allowing for great sight even in broad sunshine. Encased in a full-metal bezel and covered by Corning Gorilla Glass, the screen is scratch-resistant and resilient against regular wear and tear, ensuring long-term dependability. The Tank M3 is designed to withstand severe situations, with an excellent water resistance rating of 5 ATM and IP69K, making it not only dive-proof, but also resistant to high-pressure water jets and dust intrusion. This level of protection provides peace of mind when participating in water-based activities and outdoor experiences. Furthermore, the wristwatch has been carefully tested and certified to fulfill 15 MIL-STD-810H criteria, ensuring its resistance against drops, shocks, high temperatures, and more.

1.96” AMOLED Display

The Kospet Tank M3 Rugged has a 1.96" AMOLED display with a resolution of 331 pixels per inch (410 × 502). The resolution provides an immersive viewing experience that is both clear and colorful. The smartwatch provides exceptional visibility in strong sunlight.

The Sturdy Structure

The Tank M3 Rugged smartwatch's construction is sturdy because to the combination of a stainless steel unibody, Corning Gorilla Glass 3, and proof Polyamide. The steel unibody provides strength. The smartwatch was created from scratch using Corning Gorilla Glass 3. The Kospet Tank M3 Rugged offers exceptional flexibility to any environment.

5 ATM & IP69K (Dive-proof) Water-resistance

If you utilize the Kospet tank M3 Rugged on a wet day, you have nothing to worry about. The smartwatch can withstand 5 ATM of water and has an IP69 rating. So you may confidently dive into the swimming pool. The wristwatch can resist pressures up to 50 meters underwater.

description: The Awei P109K 30000mAh Type-C PD65W Fast Charge Power Bank is the ultimate portable power solution for those who need unparalleled capacity and fast charging capabilities. Its ability to quickly charge laptops and other high-power devices, combined with multiple output options and advanced safety features, makes it an indispensable tool for anyone on the go. Trust Awei’s expertise and innovation to keep your devices powered and ready for anything.
features: Gigantic 30000mAh Capacity: The Awei P109K offers a colossal 30000mAh battery capacity, providing ample power to charge smartphones, tablets, laptops, and other devices multiple times. Say goodbye to battery anxiety and stay powered up for days.

Type-C PD65W Fast Charging: Equipped with a Type-C port that supports Power Delivery (PD) up to 65W, this power bank can quickly charge high-power devices such as laptops, MacBooks, and more. Enjoy rapid charging speeds that keep you productive on the go.

Multiple Output Ports: In addition to the powerful Type-C port, the Awei P109K features multiple output ports, including USB-A and Micro USB, allowing you to charge several devices simultaneously. Share the power with friends or charge all your gadgets at once.

Advanced Safety Features: Safety is a priority with the Awei P109K. It includes overcharge protection, short-circuit protection, and over-discharge protection to ensure safe and reliable charging for both your devices and the power bank itself.
LED Digital Display: The sleek LED digital display provides real-time information about the remaining battery capacity and charging status, giving you precise control over your power usage.

Durable and Portable Design: Despite its high capacity, the Awei P109K is designed to be portable and durable. Its robust construction ensures it can withstand the rigors of daily use, while its compact form factor makes it easy to carry in your bag.

The Awei P109K Power bank is a versatile and reliable solution for keeping your devices powered up wherever you go. With its high capacity of 30000mAh, this power bank offers ample power to charge your devices multiple times over. Whether you’re traveling, working, or simply on the move, this power bank ensures you stay connected at all times.

One of the key highlights of this power bank is its multiple charging options. Equipped with one Type-C input and two USB-A outputs, it allows you to charge multiple devices simultaneously. This versatility makes it suitable for both personal and professional use, ensuring you can power up your devices efficiently and conveniently.

Moreover, the power bank features powerful charging capabilities, with a maximum output of 65W. The Type-C port supports PD (Power Delivery) technology, enabling fast charging for compatible devices. This ensures that your devices are charged quickly and efficiently, saving you valuable time.

Despite its high capacity and powerful charging capabilities, the power bank remains compact and lightweight. Measuring just 158.5×69×33.5mm, it is designed to be portable and easy to carry with you wherever you go. FONENG BL152 ANC + ENC True Wireless Earbuds

The FONENG BL152 ANC + ENC True Wireless Earbuds provide a full audio experience designed for modern consumers that value quality and simplicity. These BL152 earbuds, powered by the sophisticated Plan JL7006F8 chipset, use Bluetooth version 5.3 to provide a solid and efficient connection, decreasing latency and keeping your audio sharp and synced. These earbuds support various audio protocols, including HFP, HSP, A2DP, AVRCP, SPP, PBAP, and TWS+, allowing them to offer high-fidelity sound across a wide range of devices and apps. The FONENG BL152 earbuds are designed for freedom, with a Bluetooth range of up to 10 meters, allowing you to walk about without losing connection. The Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) and Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) technologies work together to eliminate undesirable background noise, whether you're in a noisy area or just want to listen to music without interruption. Each earbud has a battery life of up to 5 hours and can play music continuously, making them great for everyday commuting, exercises, or long talks. When not in use, the BL152 earbuds may be kept in the tiny battery box, which protects them while also increasing their standby duration to 12 hours. The battery box has a 3.7V/250mAh capacity and charges via a contemporary Type-C connection, requiring only one hour to completely recharge. The earbuds contain a battery capacity of 3.7V/35mAh, guaranteeing that they are ready for use when you need them. The FONENG BL152 earbuds offer more than simply performance; they're also developed with user ease in mind. The rapid charging capability, paired with their lightweight design and snug fit, make them an ideal choice for anybody searching for genuine wireless earbuds that excel at both function and form. Whether you're streaming music, taking calls, or simply relaxing with ANC, the FONENG BL152 delivers a high-quality listening experience.

description:
Imilab Imiki D2 1.43" AMOLED Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch

The Imilab Imiki D2 1.43" AMOLED Bluetooth Calling Smart Watch combines elegance, practicality, and tough durability. This smartwatch has a brilliant 1.43" Super Retina AMOLED display that produces spectacular graphics with rich colors and fine clarity. Its silicone strap provides a comfortable fit for all-day usage, and Bangla language compatibility appeals to a broader audience, making conversations more accessible. The Imiki D2 is a robust smartwatch that can keep up with your busy lifestyle. Bluetooth calling allows you to make and receive calls right from your wrist, keeping you connected wherever you go. Use the built-in voice assistant for hands-free convenience, whether you're setting reminders, checking the weather, or controlling smart home devices. For fitness fanatics, the Imiki D2 has an excellent feature set, including 100 sports modes for precise workout tracking. Whether you're jogging, cycling, or performing yoga, this wristwatch delivers extensive information on your performance and progression. The Imiki live app allows you to easily sync your data and track your health and fitness objectives. Waterproof up to 3ATM, the Imiki D2 is ideal for swimming and other water activities, allowing you to track your workouts even when wet. Plus, with a battery life of up to 10 days under moderate use, you can stay connected and busy without having to continuously recharge. With over 100 watch faces to pick from, you can tailor your Imiki D2 to your taste and mood, ensuring that it always represents your individuality. Whether you're working out or going about your everyday routine, the Imilab Imiki D2 wristwatch is the perfect companion for remaining connected, motivated, and beautiful.

Super-Retina AMOLED Display

The Imiki D2 has an AMOLED screen that rivals the top displays in the world. The display's 326 ppi pixel density creates a crisp, colorful, and lifelike image with smooth reading.

Comprehensive Health Protection

The Imiki D2 provides accurate and efficient access to important health data. The Imiki D2 watch's biometric sensor tracks various health variables simultaneously and optimizes the usage of optical light.

3ATM Waterproof Rating

The Imiki D2 smart watch has professional waterproofing up to 30 meters, making it comparable to high-end timepieces and suitable for daily usage or swimming.

Lasts Up to 30 Days

The Imiki D2 has exceptional battery life due to its electrical component selection and power optimization technologies. The watch has a battery life of 10 days with typical usage and up to 4 days without Bluetooth. Heavy usage can last up to 4 days, while Battery Saver Modes provide up to 30 days of backup.

IMILAB IMIKI MT1 TWS Bluetooth Earbuds

The IMILAB IMIKI MT1 TWS Bluetooth Earbuds feature Bluetooth v5.3 for a reliable wireless connection within a range of less than 10 meters. They are equipped with a 300mAh battery, providing approximately 3 hours of talk time and music playback. Charging the earbuds takes about 1.5 hours through the Type C charging port. IMILAB IMIKI MT1 TWS Earbuds have an IPX5 water resistance rating, making them resistant to splashes and sweat.

Share Dual-transmission TWS Technology

The IMILAB IMIKI MT1 TWS Bluetooth Earbuds features Share Dual-transmission TWS Technology, deliver audio like never before. This revolutionary technology, which differs from traditional audio forwarding modes, directly transmits mobile phone audio data to both L/R headsets in a dual-transmission mode. Enjoy a more stable Bluetooth signal, a more seamless connection, improved anti-interference capabilities, less delay, and better compatibility.

Bluetooth V5.3 Connectivity

IMILAB IMIKI MT1 TWS Earbuds redefine connectivity with Bluetooth V5.3. Take advantage of increased transmission bandwidth, faster transmission speeds, and enhanced functionality. Power consumption has been reduced by 30% compared to the previous generation, resulting in longer battery endurance for extended usage.

Wireless Gaming and Low Latency

Embrace a new dimension of gaming with the next-gen low-latency chip. Achieve an unparalleled gaming experience with audio latency as low as 65ms. Activate or deactivate the low delay mode effortlessly by tapping the left headset three times in succession.

Water-Resistant Metal Shell

The IMILAB IMIKI MT1 earbuds boast a one-piece aluminum alloy shell design, combining exceptional structural robustness with resistance to falls and wear. The metal shell exudes a premium texture, ensuring a remarkable and lasting user experience.

description: These Awei T52 ANC TWS Gaming Earbuds provide a seamless wireless experience and it’s equipped with Bluetooth 5.3 technology. While they lack game atmosphere lighting, they ensure immersive stereo sound with a dual-track sound system. features: Introducing the Awei T52 ANC True Wireless Earphone, a revolutionary audio device designed to elevate your listening experience to new heights. With its cutting-edge Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) technology, this earphone generates sound waves that counter external noise, effectively neutralizing ambient distractions with an impressive depth of 30db. Say goodbye to unwanted sounds and immerse yourself fully in your music or calls.

Equipped with Bluetooth 5.3, the Awei T52 ensures fast and stable performance, delivering lower latency, faster transmission, and seamless connectivity without the hassle of disconnections or audio-video synchronization issues. Whether you’re using an Apple or Android device, rest assured that the T52 will provide a reliable and hassle-free wireless experience.

But the Awei T52 is not just about exceptional sound quality—it also boasts cool ambient lights that ignite an e-sports atmosphere. Stand out from the crowd and unleash your e-sports confidence with every use. Moreover, with a 24-hour playtime and a 300mAh charging case, the T52 offers extended listening sessions and convenient recharging, thanks to its durable and safe Li-polymer batteries with higher density and capacity.

Experience high-definition calls without compromise, thanks to the Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) feature, which accurately picks up your voice while reducing ambient noise. The Awei T52 ANC TWS Wireless Earphone Gaming Headset is the perfect companion for gamers and audio enthusiasts alike, delivering immersive sound quality and unparalleled comfort.

description:
XIAOMI Redmi Buds 4 Active True Wireless Earbuds

The XIAOMI Redmi Buds 4 Active True Wireless Earbuds are equipped with advanced Bluetooth 5.3 for a stable connection. They feature a 12mm dynamic driver that delivers powerful bass and enhanced acoustics. The earbuds have noise cancellation for clear calls. The earbuds support low-latency mode for a smooth gaming experience and offer convenient touch control operations. They are compatible with Google Fast Pair for quick connection to Android devices. The earbuds are water-resistant with an IPX4 rating.

12mm Dynamic Driver

The XIAOMI Redmi Buds 4 Active is equipped with a 12mm dynamic driver and delivers powerful bass and heightened acoustics. Expertly tuned by the Xiaomi Acoustic Lab, these earbuds provide a pleasing listening experience for users worldwide, immersing you in the richness of your favorite music.

Noise Cancellation for Calls

The Redmi Buds 4 Active features a high-sensitivity microphone that effectively mitigates ambient noise, ensuring optimal clarity of speech. Whether you're in a busy environment or on the move, these earbuds enable clear communication.

28-hour Ultra Long Battery Life

XIAOMI Redmi Buds 4 Active offers an impressive battery life, providing up to 5 hours of continuous listening on a single charge. With the portable charging case, you can extend the usage to an impressive 28 hours, allowing you to enjoy great music day and night without worrying about recharging frequently.

Fast Charging Support

Redmi Buds 4 Active allows you to quickly charge them for just 10 minutes and enjoy up to 110 minutes of music playback. This feature ensures you can take short breaks and get right back into your music journey without any significant interruptions.

Smooth Gaming Experience with Low-Latency Mode

Bluetooth 5.3 technology of the Redmi Buds 4 Active enables low-latency mode for a smooth gaming experience with exceptional precision. With reduced lag, you can enjoy immersive gaming sessions and stay in control with accurate and timely responses.

Convenient Touch Control

Controlling your earbuds is made easy with touch control operations. With light touches, you can effortlessly switch between different modes, skip to the next track, play/pause music, answer or reject calls, and more. The Redmi Buds 4 Active give you complete control from anywhere.

Google Fast Pair

The Redmi Buds 4 Active support Google Fast Pair by simply opening the cover, allowing for simple Bluetooth pairing with your Android devices. With a single tap, you can connect and even locate your misplaced earbuds.

IPX4 water-resistance

The Redmi Buds 4 Active feature an IPX4 water-resistant design that has passed rigorous testing. Whether you're outdoors or hitting the gym, these earbuds can handle your active lifestyle, providing reliable performance even in the face of sweat or light rain.

The A997BL model is a product created for people with gaming interests 40 mm large, premium magnetic transducers will meet the expectations of even the most demanding users. The over-ear headphones work based on Bluetooth 5.1 technology, which guarantees fast data transfer, strongly prevents interference and offers smooth and clear sound.

The use of Bluetooth 5.1 technology allows for wide compatibility of the headphones with other devices - almost 99% of devices available on the market will have a wireless connection to these headphones!  The headphones are very functional - they can be used via wireless data transmission and cable. Enabling a cable means that even when the built-in batteries are discharged, you can still listen to your favorite music. The innovative A997BL model is distinguished not only by its modern design but also by its impressive battery capacity of up to 300 mAh.

This is a significant step forward in battery life, enabling the user to enjoy continuous operation for an impressive period of up to 15 hours without the need for recharging.  Such exceptional performance puts this model at the forefront of mobile solutions, ensuring not only long-term use but also exceptional reliability in a variety of conditions. Now you can be sure that your device will be ready to operate for a long time, regardless of the intensity of your activity.
features: Introducing the Awei A997BL PRO Wireless Gaming Headphones, designed with the avid gamer in mind. Equipped with 40mm premium magnetic transducers, these headphones deliver an immersive gaming experience, capturing every intricate sound detail with remarkable realism. Whether you’re exploring virtual worlds or engaging in intense battles, the A997BL headphones ensure you’re at the heart of the action.

Not just for gaming enthusiasts, these headphones also cater to audiophiles seeking superior music quality. With Bluetooth 5.1 technology, data transfer is swift and seamless, guaranteeing clear, uninterrupted sound. The headphones boast wide compatibility, connecting wirelessly to nearly 99% of devices on the market.

Versatility is key with the Awei A997BL model. You can opt for wireless connectivity or use the included cable for a wired connection, ensuring uninterrupted music playback even when the batteries run low. Speaking of batteries, the A997BL headphones feature an impressive 300mAh battery capacity, providing up to 15 hours of continuous operation on a single charge.

In addition to its modern design, the A997BL stands out for its exceptional reliability. It’s built to withstand various conditions, ensuring long-term use without compromise. Whether you’re gaming for hours or on the move, rest assured your device will keep up with your activity level.

Now, let’s delve into the technical specifications. The A997BL headphones support Bluetooth version V5.1, with a dual-channel system for enhanced connectivity. In conclusion, the Awei A997BL Wireless Gaming Headphones are a must-have for gamers and music enthusiasts alike, offering unparalleled sound quality, versatility, and reliability for an immersive audio experience.

description:

The Haylou Watch 2 Pro, is a smartwatch that combines style, functionality, and advanced features to enhance your daily life. With its impressive 1.85" colorful display, you'll experience a bigger and clearer view of all your watch's information and notifications. Whether you're checking the time, reading messages, or tracking your fitness goals, the vibrant display ensures a visually appealing experience. The Haylou Watch 2 Pro is its exceptional battery life. With a whopping 20 days of battery life, you can go about your daily routine without worrying about constantly charging your watch. This extended battery life allows you to make the most out of its various functions and features without interruption. Staying connected is made easier with the incoming call reminder feature. You'll never miss an important call again as the watch discreetly notifies you of incoming calls, allowing you to stay connected and accessible wherever you are. Designed to keep up with an active lifestyle, the Haylou Watch 2 Pro is IP68 waterproof, making it resistant to water and dust. Whether you're sweating it out at the gym or caught in the rain, this smartwatch is built to withstand the elements, ensuring durability and reliability. With an impressive 100 workout modes, the Haylou Watch 2 Pro is a comprehensive fitness companion. Whether you're into running, cycling, swimming, or yoga, this watch has you covered. It tracks your progress, monitors your heart rate, and provides real-time feedback, helping you achieve your fitness goals with precision. This Haylou Watch 2 Pro offers comprehensive health functions to support your overall well-being. It features a heart rate monitor, sleep tracking, sedentary reminders, and stress monitoring, providing valuable insights into your health and helping you make positive lifestyle changes.

Stylish Metallic Bezel Sleek and Exquisite

The Haylou Watch 2 Pro body features lightweight metal and an integrated watch lug design. And the matte finish adds extra elegance and fine texture to the watch.

Large 1.85" Display Clear and Bright

The Haylou Watch 2 Pro Smart Watch's ultra-large 1.85" display is vivid and clear from every angle, allowing for a flexible layout of all features and accurate touch control operation.

The App offers over 100 watch faces, covering themes like sports, minimalism, technology, and machinery. You can also select your favorite photos as the watch faces.

100 Workout Modes

The Haylou Watch 2 Pro has 100 workout modes and covers the most popular sports. And the upgraded high-precision sensor can record data more accurately.

Daily Activity Record

The Haylou Watch 2 Pro Smart Watch can record steps, distance, calories, and other workout data automatically. Set your daily target, and healthy life is close at hand.

SpO2 and Heart Rate Monitoring

The Haylou Watch 2 Pro dynamically tracks your heart rate and blood oxygen level even at nighttime. It can also test stress levels to help you relieve stress through breathing training.

Smart Sleep Monitoring

The Haylou Watch 2 Pro intelligently records sleep conditions at different stages, such as deep sleep, light sleep, and REM, helping you develop healthier sleep habits.

Female Health Reminders

Get predictions and reminders for upcoming fertile and menstrual periods so that you can lead an elegant and worry-free life.

10-day Battery Life

This Haylou Watch 2 Pro With one full charge, the Haylou Watch 2 Pro can be used for more than one week in daily mode and about 20 days in extended battery life mode. No need to take the charger for a short trip.

IP68 Dustproof & Waterproof

The Haylou Watch 2 Pro can withstand all your daily activities and easily cope with sweating during strenuous workouts or stormy rains.

Remote Control Camera

Connect Haylou Watch 2 Pro to the phone APP for camera control. No need to ask passers-by for help. Record every important moment through the watch.

Incoming Call Reminder

Connect your Haylou Watch 2 Pro to your mobile phone via Bluetooth. Calls, WeChat, and various APP information can be synced with the watch in real time. Never miss any important message.

The Hoco EW72 earbuds employ GFSK and π/4-DQPSK modulation types, which contribute to a stable and clear signal transmission. The EW72 earbuds use GFSK and π/4-DQPSK modulation types, contributing to their reliable and clear signal transmission. The 13mm speakers deliver powerful sound, complemented by an impedance of 32Ω±15%, a frequency response range of 20Hz to 20,000Hz, and a sensitivity of 98dB±3dB, ensuring detailed and dynamic audio reproduction across all frequencies. These Hoco EW72 earbuds are designed with functionality in mind, including a charging box with a 360mAh battery capacity that can recharge the earbuds in roughly an hour. Each earbud contains a 30mAh battery, which may last up to 4 hours of call time or music playback on a single charge. The EW72 earbuds are lightweight, with each earpiece weighing only 3.7g, making them suitable for extended usage. The entire weight, including the charging chamber, is 57.6g, providing portability without sacrificing performance. The Hoco EW72 also features an HD display, which adds a touch of modern convenience by making it easy to check battery levels and connection status. With a charging voltage of DC5V, these earbuds recharge quickly and are ready to use whenever you need them.

Awei P175K Portable power bank: AWEI Power bank P175K. This portable power bank is the perfect solution for people who need to charge their devices outdoors regardless of the circumstances. Whether you spend time in nature or use solar power, this device will meet your expectations. With a 20,000 mAh battery, this powerhouse can charge your mobile devices multiple times, giving you peace of mind and independence wherever you go. Bright lamp for emergencies The power bank has a large lamp, which is an added advantage in case of need.

This will keep you reassured even on long journeys or trips where you need an extra source of light. The lamp can be easily switched on and off, which makes it very comfortable to use. In addition, its brightness is sufficient to illuminate a larger area, allowing you to take full advantage of the power bank's functionality. USB and USB-C charging ports The power bank has USB and USB-C charging ports for charging various mobile devices. Thanks to the fast charging speed, the battery of your smartphone, tablet, or other mobile devices will be charged quickly. Now you don't have to wait until the battery is fully charged. The charging ports are easy to use and convenient for charging your devices.

Safety and convenience in one The power bank has special surge protection mechanisms so you don't have to worry about the safety of your devices. It is a great solution for people who value reliability and convenience in situations where there is no access to external power. description:
Mi Dual Driver In-ear Earphones

Mi Dual Driver in-ear earphones come with unmatched high-definition audio along with a comfortable design.  This perfect design earphone comes with multiple incredible features to give you an immersive and uncomplicated hearing experience. The dual dynamic drivers with anodized aluminum cavities make it incomparable to the other headphones. 

 

Why MI Dual Driver Earphone?

  • It consists of Dual Dynamic Drivers

  • It has Crisp Vocals & Rich Bass

  • Comes with Passive Noise Cancellation

  • It has Magnetic Earbuds

  • It has Tangle-Free Braided Cable

 

Immersive Audio 

Dual drivers will provide a never-before-heard audio experience. Every note is vividly experienced thanks to the immersive sound. A combination of these exceptional and incredible audio features gives you the best audio experience ever. 

 

Dual Dynamic Driver

Rich bass and clear treble are delivered by the drivers, which together make up the dual dynamic driver structure, for a high-quality audio experience. While a single driver concentrates on a particular frequency range and ignores the mids and highs, dual drivers guarantee minimum distortion and focus on all frequencies to produce a full sound stage.

 

Built for You

A precise anodizing technique is used to create the anodized aluminum cavity, and it is then refined with a zircon sandblasting process. This makes the earbuds lightweight, scratch-proof, and resistant to fingerprints. The exterior shell has a sophisticated carbon appearance for unforced elegance.

 

Perfectly Design

The anti-winding braided cable is touchably smooth. Without having to worry about constantly untangling it, you may store it in your pockets, backpack, or case with ease. And it also gives comfort with its best-quality build. 

 

Here are Some Extra Features

  • 3-button operation for better convenience and operability 

  • Trigger the voice assistant by long pressing the play/pause button

  • The magnetic suction design makes the storage process simple and effortless

  • 90° close-fitting design fits almost all smartphones

  • The minimal wire exposure keeps the durability intact

  • Soft comfortable anti-slip earplugs perfectly fit the contour of your ears offering exceptional comfort
